DbDetails.DbTable: tms.xtmsm_operateline x left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x0 on x.cityid_start=x0.cityid left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x1 on x.cityid_end=x1.cityid

tms.xtmsm_operateline x left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x0 on x.cityid_start=x0.cityid left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x1 on x.cityid_end=x1.cityid LEFT JOIN tms.xtmsm_operateline_detail xd ON x.operateline_id=xd.operateline_id LEFT JOIN tms.xtmsm_master_city xdc ON xd.city_id=xdc.CityID
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from %{dbtable} where org_guid='%{orgguid}' %{where} GROUP BY x.operateline_id limit %{StartRow},%{PgSize}

DbDetails.DbTable: tms.xtmsm_operateline x left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x0 on x.cityid_start=x0.cityid left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x1 on x.cityid_end=x1.cityid LEFT JOIN tms.xtmsm_operateline_detail xd ON x.operateline_id=xd.operateline_id LEFT JOIN tms.xtmsm_master_city xdc ON xd.city_id=xdc.CityID
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from %{dbtable} where org_guid='%{orgguid}' %{where} GROUP BY x.operateline_id limit %{StartRow},%{PgSize}
